credit_line: Gift of Tibor Kalman/ M & co.
title: M&Co: Transmittal Sheet
description: An excerpt from a map in strip form is imprinted in green from top to bottom on the left side of the page. M&Co/ A Design Group, Inc., followed underneath by address and telephone information on three lines, is in the upper right hand corner. The remainder of the sheet is imprinted with horizontal lines, accompanied on the left and right sides by transmittal directions and check off boxes.
name: form
